price: Siku watakapotoka makaburini kwa upesi kama kwamba wanakimbilia mfundo,
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعٗا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٖ يُوفِضُونَ
footnotes: Siku watakapo tolewa makaburini mbio mbio kumwendea huyo ataye waita, kama kwamba wamemweka ufundo na wakimuabudu duniani walivyo kuwa wakimkimbilia badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma yakhrujūna mina al-ajdāthi sirāʿan ka-annahum ilā nuṣubin yūfiḍūna
